scripts.stdb:dev: spacetime dev --server local --database marbles2 --project-path . --module-bindings-path MarblesUnityProject\Assets\ModuleBindings --client-lang csharp --module-project-path .\spacetimedb -y
scripts.stdb:gen: spacetime generate --lang csharp --out-dir MarblesUnityProject\Assets\Scripts\ModuleBindings --project-path spacetimedb -y && spacetime generate --lang typescript --out-dir apps\web\marbles-web-client\src\module_bindings --project-path spacetimedb -y
scripts.stdb:pub:prod: npm run stdb:gen && spacetime publish --project-path ./spacetimedb -s maincloud marbles2dev -y
scripts.stdb:pubClear:prod: npm run stdb:gen && spacetime publish --project-path ./spacetimedb -s maincloud marbles2dev -c -y
